argument.name: pointer
argument.description: A dot variable containing the text displayed in the control.

argument.name: active_tab
argument.description: Optional. Specifies which tab on the dialog will have initial focus.

page.description: Displays a search and replace dialog box for a text object in an Xdialog box. Options for active_tab are 'Find', 'Replace' and 'Goto'
page.discussion: The A5_GENERICSEARCHREPLACE() function displays the Find/Replace/Goto dialog box for a text object on an Xdialog form.
page.example: dim ptext as P dim ptext.text as C dim ptext.object as P ptext.text = "some text" ui_dlg_box("title",<<%dlg% .20ptext; ; %dlg%,<<%code% if (a_dlg_button = "Find") then a5_genericsearchreplace(ptext) a_dlg_button = "" end if %code%)
